compatibility.notes: ZPL-2.0 is a permissive license that allows for integration with other licenses, but care must be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all redistributions.
Maintain attribution to Zope Corporation and contributors.
State any changes made to the original files.
license.name: ZPL-2.0
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of conditions in source code redistributions.
Reproduce copyright notice and list of conditions in binary redistributions.
Do not use the name Zope Corporation to endorse or promote derived products without permission.
Do not use Servicemarks or Trademarks of Zope Corporation without a separate agreement.
Include prominent notices in modified files stating changes and dates.
